author: adminelevation
name: weatherdotgov
description: Current conditions, future forecasts, radar station information, observation station information, and a glossary of hundreds of weather-related terms all in one cog.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the WeatherDotGov cog. Use `[p]weather` and/or `[p]weatherset` to get started.
end_user_data_statement: This cog logs user information like zip codes, and statistical information like the amount of users who use weather functionality, how many zip codes are stored in the bot's memory, how many users have alerts enabled, how many severe weather alerts have been dispatched, how many nowcasts have been provided, and how many forecasts have been provided
